alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Iron; Sawyer (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 2:21AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Bayfield, northwestern Iron, Ashland and east central Sawyer Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 220 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Washburn, to 7 miles west of Gurney, to near Upson, to near Glidden, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... La Pointe, Gurney and Upson around 225 AM CDT. Saxon around 230 AM CDT. Hurley and Gile around 235 AM CDT. Madeline Island around 240 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Big Bay State Park, Kimball, Van Buskirk, Bad River Reservation, Stockton Island, Gile Flowage, Cedar, Franks Field, Island Lake Iron County and Pence. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
